events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred on the highway yesterday afternoon. Immediate claim filing initiated.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial details and identifying vehicle damage.
An insurance agent specializing in auto claims was assigned promptly to assist the customer with their accident case.
Customer received official acknowledgment of claim receipt along with next steps to provide necessary documents.
Request sent for the police report, photos of vehicle damage, and a detailed description of the incident from the customer.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report, vehicle damage photos, and witness statements promptly.
Investigation team commenced review of submitted documents and scheduled vehicle inspection with a certified mechanic.
Investigation finalized with assessment report confirming the extent of damage and responsibility in the accident.
Proposal of settlement offer sent to the customer based on damage assessment and policy coverage limits.
Customer responded positively, agreeing to the settlement terms and expressing satisfaction with the handling process.
Claim officially approved for settlement payment based on accepted terms and conditions by the customer.
Payment was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account for vehicle repairs as per the settlement agreement.
The claim was formally closed after confirming the customer received payment and was satisfied with the resolution.
All relevant claim documents and correspondence were archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
